trigger: Find My Match button on Assessment Screen

nodes.label: Match Coordinator Agent
nodes.description: Orchestrates the compatibility analysis workflow, routes adopter data to sub-agents, aggregates profile analysis with animal assessments, and generates final ranked recommendations with detailed compatibility explanations

nodes.label: Adopter Profile Agent
nodes.description: Analyzes questionnaire responses to build comprehensive adopter profile including activity level, experience score, home environment rating, time availability, and lifestyle compatibility factors

nodes.label: Animal Compatibility Agent
nodes.description: Evaluates each available animal's behavioral profile, needs, and temperament against the adopter profile to calculate compatibility scores across multiple dimensions

manager.name: Match Coordinator Agent
manager.description: Orchestrates the compatibility analysis workflow, routes adopter data to sub-agents, aggregates profile analysis with animal assessments, and generates final ranked recommendations with detailed compatibility explanations
manager.goal: Coordinate the complete pet-adopter matching workflow by routing questionnaire data to specialized sub-agents, aggregating their analyses, and synthesizing comprehensive ranked recommendations that optimize for both adopter satisfaction and animal welfare

sub_agents.name: Adopter Profile Agent
sub_agents.description: Analyzes questionnaire responses to build comprehensive adopter profile including activity level, experience score, home environment rating, time availability, and lifestyle compatibility factors
sub_agents.goal: Analyze adopter questionnaire data to create a comprehensive lifestyle and compatibility profile that captures activity level, pet ownership experience, home environment characteristics, time availability, and lifestyle factors critical for successful pet matching

sub_agents.name: Animal Compatibility Agent
sub_agents.description: Evaluates each available animal's behavioral profile, needs, and temperament against the adopter profile to calculate compatibility scores across multiple dimensions (energy match, space needs, experience requirements, special care factors)
sub_agents.goal: Analyze available animals' behavioral profiles, care requirements, and temperament characteristics against adopter profiles to calculate multi-dimensional compatibility scores and generate ranked match recommendations with detailed compatibility explanations
